title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Behavior-Analysis-Based Computerized Math Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level mathematics knowledge and foundational understanding of instructional design
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can construct a computer-based mathematics education design framework by applying behavior analysis principles.
Learners can develop mathematics education content applicable to real corporate environments using a project-based approach.
Learners can design an assessment system that links learner behavior data with educational content based on a technological environment analysis.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
